price: Na akakumbuka jina la Mola wake Mlezi, na akaswali.
footnotes: Na akalikumbuka jina la Muumba wake kwa moyo wake na ulimi wake, na akaswali kwa unyenyekevu kama itakikanavyo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
